MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.00pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site outside 4 Manor Place and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00pm.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:24pm on Wednesday, 31 March 2021
